name: Blood Beak
text: Your bleed attack is bloody and dangerous.
prerequisites: Base attack bonus +5, natural weapon racial trait, tengu.
benefit: Increase the damage of your beak attack to 1d6. Furthermore, when you confirm a critical hit with your beak attack, you also deal 1 point of bleed damage.
special: The bleed effect from this feat stacks with that of the Bleeding Critical feat and similar effects, adding 1 point to your bleed damage.
staminaText: You can spend 1 stamina point when you confirm a critical hit with your beak to increase the bleed damage to 1d4 points of bleed damage.
text_zh: 你的流血攻击血腥而又危险。
prerequisites_zh: BAB+5，【天生武器】种族特性，天狗。
benefit_zh: 你的啮咬攻击伤害提升至1d6。此外，当你的啮咬攻击造成重击时，你可以额外造成1点出血伤害。
special_zh: 该专长获得的出血伤害与“流血重击”以及同类效果叠加，使你的出血伤害增加1点。
staminaText_zh: 当你的喙啄重击确认时，你可以花费一点耐力点将流血伤害提升至1d4。
